description: View Tesla vehicle data from your self-hosted Teslamate instance MateDroid is a native Android application for viewing Tesla vehicle data from your self-hosted Teslamate instance via TeslamateApi. Features: • Dashboard - Real-time vehicle status at a glance with 3D car image matching your vehicle's color and wheels • Stats for Nerds - Tap car image for advanced statistics: records, extremes, AC/DC ratio and much more! • Charging History - View all charging sessions with statistics and charts • Charge Details - Interactive map and detailed power/voltage/temperature charts • Drive History - Track trips with efficiency metrics and route visualization • Battery Health - Monitor battery degradation over time • Software Updates - Track update history • Car color based themes - Light/dark themes with palette based on your car color Requirements: • Android 8.0 (API 26) or higher • A running Teslamate instance (https://github.com/adriankumpf/teslamate) • TeslamateApi deployed and accessible (https://github.com/tobiasehlert/teslamateapi) Privacy: MateDroid connects only to your self-hosted server. No data is sent to third parties. Your Tesla data stays under your control. Open Source: MateDroid is free and open source software licensed under GPL-3.0.
